# init(sampleBuffer:)

**Initializer**

Creates a timed metadata group with a sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init?(sampleBuffer: CMReadySampleBuffer<CMSampleBuffer.DynamicContent>)
```

## Parameters

- **sampleBuffer**: A [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMReadySampleBuffer] with media type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/kCMMediaType_Metadata].

## Return Value

An instance of `AVTimedMetadataGroup`.

## Creating a timed metadata group

- **init(items:timeRange:)**: Creates a timed metadata group initialized with the given metadata items.
- **init(sampleBuffer:)**

items.description: Creates a timed metadata group initialized with the given metadata items.
items.name: init(items:timeRange:)
